location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Sir Harford Jones [Brydges], Baronet, His Britannic Majesty's Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary to Persia

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the seizure of Shaik Abdull Russool Khan [Shaikh ‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān], Governor of Bushire, due to large debts he has accumulated. Enclosed with the letter is a statement of debts owed by the said Shaik to both East India Company and private individuals under British protection.
